block.description: Display the button group as a full-width block element spanning the entire container width

classPrefix.description: Custom CSS class prefix for styling flexibility and theme customization

disabled.description: Disable all buttons within the group

divided.description: Display buttons in a divided layout

justified.description: Distribute buttons evenly with equal width in horizontal layout

size.description: Uniform size for all buttons in the group (large/medium/small/extra-small)

vertical.description: Display buttons in a vertical stacked layout
